mapper.select: select distinct r.movie_rating_no as ratingNo , r.movie_rating_name as ratingName , r.movie_rating_image_url as ratingImageURL , m.movie_no as movieNo , m.movie_name as movieName from movie m, movie_rating r, show_schedule sc where m.movie_rating_no = r.movie_rating_no and sc.movie_no = m.movie_no
